channel.title: Somthing about the games disconnecting me when i lkog in
channel.description: well every time i log in on moparscape i see my guy for like 10 seconds then it disconnectects me and i says i am in and makes me restart the page and it keeps happening over and over again like what program should i download to make my game better so far i downloaded java runtime update 8 and java vr 3.1.0_05 and it still dosen't work right do can u plz tell me the programs u use on it or how it works for u or somthing that will stop these problem for me =( if u ever had these on ur moparscape program and got rid of it can u tell me how u did it please =( thank u

item.title: Somthing about the games disconnecting me when i lkog in
item.dc:creator: @gordygord gordygord
item.description:
@gordygord wrote:

What do you mean you log on moparscape? If its a server thats the server problem otherwise than your moparsscape and please type more clearly i dont have a clue of most of what you said in the post.

Read full topic
